message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $15000. It's a one-time offer, and I think you'll really love it.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $15000 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go. I'm very interested in the product, but I'd be comfortable paying up to $8500. What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $12000. What do you think?
